blessings.description: Two Adjacent Players in your Team's Lineup will gain +15% Moxie.
blessings.title: Buddies

blessings.description: Chaarge! Give your Team AA Blood.
blessings.title: Power Chaarge

blessings.description: Give your Team Acidic Blood.
blessings.title: Xenomorph

blessings.description: Call the Alternate for all Players in your Shadows.
blessings.title: On Deck

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Jersey Crate.
blessings.title: Jerseys Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Rings Crate.
blessings.title: Rings Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Necklace Crate.
blessings.title: Necklace Supply Run

blessings.description: All Players on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Generic Sunglasses Crate.
blessings.title: Sunglasses Supply Run

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Jersey Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Jersey Drop

blessings.description: A Random Pitcher on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Ring Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Ring Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Necklace Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Necklace Drop

blessings.description: A Random Player on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Handcrafted Sunglasses Crate.
blessings.title: Handcrafted Sunglasses Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Dexterity Crate.
blessings.title: Dexterity Crate Drop

blessings.description: A Random Player on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Slime Crate.
blessings.title: Slime Crate Drop

blessings.description: A Random Hitter on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open a Blood Crate.
blessings.title: Blood Crate Drop

blessings.description: A Random Pitcher on your Team with an available Item slot (empty or broken) will open an Intelligence Crate.
blessings.title: Intelligence Crate Drop

blessings.description: Promote the Best Baserunner in your Team's Shadows to a random position in the Lineup.
blessings.title: In a Pinch

blessings.description: Promote the Best Defender in your Team's Shadows to a random position in the Lineup.
blessings.title: Patchwork

blessings.description: Recruit a Random Player in the League with the Alternate Modification to your Team.
blessings.title: Alternator

blessings.description: Recruit a Random Player in the League with the Attractor Modification to your Team.
blessings.title: Strange Attractor

blessings.description: The Last Three Players in your Team's Lineup will gain 10% Thwackability.
blessings.title: Last Not Least

blessings.description: Move the Best Overall Hitter in your Team's Lineup or Rotation to the #3 spot in your Team's Lineup.
blessings.title: Set the Table

blessings.description: A random player in your Team's Rotation will gain 40% Overpowerment but lose 20% Unthwackability.
blessings.title: Grounded

blessings.description: A random player in your Team's Rotation will gain 40% Unthwackability but lose 20% Overpowerment.
blessings.title: Untouchable

decrees.description: Upshelling Events on the Feed will earn you Coins and Prizes.
decrees.title: Forum

decrees.description: Reveal the Ancient Histories of Blaseball.
decrees.title: Library

decrees.description: Add a Will that lets you build a custom Item and give it to a Player on your Team.
decrees.title: Laboratory

decrees.description: All non-Playoff Teams from this Season build a Smithy in their Ballpark, which occasionally repairs Items.
decrees.title: Smithy

decrees.description: The Top 99 Events of each Season will be Remembered.
decrees.title: Monument

decrees.description: All games have a chance of being Prize Matches, in which the winning Team will open an Item Crate.
decrees.title: Fairgrounds

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team. They must be within 2 combined stars of each other.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Equivalent Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Move a Player on your Team to the desired location on your Roster.

info.description: Which Player would you like to move?
Which location do you want to move them?

wills.title: Move

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30% in a Stat Category of your choice, but Impair them in a Random other Category.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?
Which stat category do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Transfuse

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team, with a mystery Benefit.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate Trust for?

wills.title: Alternate Trust

wills.description: Re-roll an eligible Permanent Modification for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to Reform?
Which mod would you like to Re-roll?

wills.title: Reform

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
